name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Ray of Jewelry【#ホロ0期生ライブ2024】 [AUu9pSkkgaY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC section after the first song performance where the members discuss the stage design and their history.
Tokino Sora and AZKi perform 'Hajimeno Ippo'.
Sakura Miko and Hoshimachi Suisei begin their performance of 'Sugar Rush'.

subtitles.original: ねー！
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 宝石をイメージしてステージを作ってもらいました！
subtitles.english: They designed this stage with a jewelry theme in mind!

subtitles.original: おおー！素敵ー！
subtitles.english: Whoa! It's lovely!

subtitles.original: ま、0期生初ライブなので
subtitles.english: Well, since it's the first Gen 0 live...

subtitles.original: 気合入れてもらっちゃったよね、うちら。
subtitles.english: ...we really went all out with the production, didn't we?

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: そして、先ほど歌ったのがドリームストーリーだったんですけど
subtitles.english: And we just sang "Dream Story" earlier...

subtitles.original: はい。後ろに映像が流れてましたよね。
subtitles.english: ...and there was a video playing in the background, right?

subtitles.original: 流れてたー！
subtitles.english: It was playing!

subtitles.original: 懐かしすぎた。
subtitles.english: It was so nostalgic.

subtitles.original: あちらですね、ファーストフェスの時の映像だったということで
subtitles.english: That was actually footage from the First Fes...

subtitles.original: 4年半前でございます。
subtitles.english: ...which was four and a half years ago.

subtitles.original: 歴史を感じるね。やっぱ見ただけでわかるしね、なんかね。
subtitles.english: You can really feel the history. You can tell just by looking at it.

subtitles.original: なんか私たちの姿めっちゃ変わってない？
subtitles.english: Don't we look totally different?

subtitles.original: そうだよね、成長したんだよね。
subtitles.english: That's right, we've really grown.

subtitles.original: 成長したよねー。
subtitles.english: We sure have.

subtitles.original: みこも成長したよね。
subtitles.english: Miko has grown too.

subtitles.original: 成長したー！
subtitles.english: You have!

subtitles.original: あづきも。
subtitles.english: AZKi too.

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしすぎたな。
subtitles.english: That was so embarrassing.

subtitles.original: エモいな。
subtitles.english: It's so moving.

subtitles.original: そんなね、私たちは今日はね、お互いのいろんな曲を歌っていくので
subtitles.english: Anyway, we'll be singing various songs of each other's today...

subtitles.original: どの曲を歌うか楽しみにしていてください！
subtitles.english: ...so please look forward to seeing which ones we perform!

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Okay!

subtitles.original: では早速ですが、次の曲に行きましょう！
subtitles.english: Now, without further ado, let's move on to the next song!

subtitles.original: 準備してきました！
subtitles.english: We're ready!

subtitles.original: お着替え行ってきまーす！
subtitles.english: We're going to go change!

subtitles.original: 飛んで来な
subtitles.english: Fly on over

subtitles.original: めちゃ進む
subtitles.english: Keep moving forward

subtitles.original: 都市部を抜けて遊び場へ
subtitles.english: Through the city to the playground

subtitles.original: いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original:
ハジメノイッポ
作詞・作曲・編曲：ナユタン星人
subtitles.english:
Hajimeno Ippo
Lyrics, Composition, & Arrangement: Nayutalien

subtitles.original: 前人未到のトキメキ知りたい人？
subtitles.english: Who wants to know an unprecedented thrill?

subtitles.original: いっせーの いーんじゃない？
subtitles.english: All together now, isn't it fine?

subtitles.original: 今だっていいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it fine right now?

subtitles.original: 希望の通り遊びたい人？
subtitles.english: Who wants to play just as they hope?

subtitles.original: それって君じゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't that you?

subtitles.original: 今日はいっちゃいいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it fine to go for it today?

subtitles.original: タイム・イズ・マネー
subtitles.english: Time is money

subtitles.original: そりゃ何のマネ？
subtitles.english: What kind of imitation is that?

subtitles.original: 寄り道こそ人生の醍醐味です
subtitles.english: Detours are the best part of life

subtitles.original: 行きたい方にダッシュ
subtitles.english: Dash in the direction you want to go

subtitles.original: そんでハート奪取
subtitles.english: And steal some hearts

subtitles.original: この作戦 もう怪し隠すはない
subtitles.english: This plan, there's no more hiding the suspicion

subtitles.original: 動かなかった足を
subtitles.english: My feet that wouldn't move

subtitles.original: 今は踏み出したいと思える
subtitles.english: Now I feel like I want to take a step forward

subtitles.original: 一人ではできなかったこと
subtitles.english: Things I couldn't do alone

subtitles.original: やっちゃうよ？行っちゃうよ？いっせーの！
subtitles.english: I'll do it! I'm going! One, two!

subtitles.original: 一層一層さ ぶっ飛んでいくぞ
subtitles.english: Higher and higher, we're gonna blast off

subtitles.original: ぐんぐんこの調子 霧はまだまだ
subtitles.english: Keep up this pace, the mist is still there

subtitles.original: でも一歩一歩って 進んでいくぞ
subtitles.english: But step by step, we'll keep moving forward

subtitles.original: これが我らの第一歩
subtitles.english: This is our first step

subtitles.original: しかと見ていてくださいな
subtitles.english: Please keep a close watch on us

subtitles.original: 転んだり迷ったり浮き足立たせ
subtitles.english: Falling, getting lost, getting restless

subtitles.original: もうちょっと付き合ってくださいませ
subtitles.english: Please stick with me a little longer

subtitles.original: 跳躍時だてに 減速なんてございません
subtitles.english: There's no slowing down when we're jumping

subtitles.original: 飛んで来な
subtitles.english: Fly on over

subtitles.original: めちゃ進む
subtitles.english: Keep moving forward

subtitles.original: 都市部を抜けて遊び場へ
subtitles.english: Through the city to the playground

subtitles.original: いぇい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: もしや今 とてもいい感じ？
subtitles.english: Could it be that things feel great right now?

subtitles.original: もっとギア上げちゃっていい感じ？
subtitles.english: Is it okay to shift into a higher gear?

subtitles.original: 今日という日は
subtitles.english: Today is the day...

subtitles.original: だから目一杯 声出してみよう Let's go! Say!
subtitles.english: ...so let's shout at the top of our lungs! Let's go! Say!

subtitles.original: (Wow Wow Wow) 世界一大きく
subtitles.english: (Wow Wow Wow) The loudest in the world

subtitles.original: (Wow Wow Wow) いいよもっともう一回
subtitles.english: (Wow Wow Wow) Nice, one more time

subtitles.original: (Wow Wow Wow) 宇宙一楽しく
subtitles.english: (Wow Wow Wow) The most fun in the universe

subtitles.original: うん、めっちゃ最高！
subtitles.english: Yeah, it's absolutely awesome!

subtitles.original: 少しもやっていた未来
subtitles.english: A future that was a bit hazy

subtitles.original: 今は期待とかしてみちゃう
subtitles.english: Now I find myself looking forward to it

subtitles.original: 君がいたから見れた景色
subtitles.english: The scenery I could see because you were there

subtitles.original: やっちゃうよ？行っちゃうよ？いっせーの！
subtitles.english: I'll do it! I'm going! One, two!

subtitles.original: 一層一層って 突っ込んだものの
subtitles.english: I charged in further and further, but...

subtitles.original: どんどん待ってるでっかい世界にクラクラ
subtitles.english: ...the vast world waiting for me makes me dizzy

subtitles.original: でも一歩一歩を 大事にするぞ
subtitles.english: But I'll treasure every single step

subtitles.original: それが我らの第一歩
subtitles.english: That is our first step

subtitles.original: 一層一層さ ぶっ飛んでいくぞ
subtitles.english: Higher and higher, we're gonna blast off

subtitles.original: ぐんぐんこの調子 霧はもうすぐ
subtitles.english: Keep up this pace, the mist will clear soon

subtitles.original: この一歩一歩を 楽しんでいくぞ
subtitles.english: I'm going to enjoy every single step

subtitles.original: それじゃみんなで第一歩
subtitles.english: Now then, everyone together for the first step

subtitles.original: しかと見ていてくださいな
subtitles.english: Please keep a close watch on us

subtitles.original: 転んだり迷ったり浮き足立たせ
subtitles.english: Falling, getting lost, getting restless

subtitles.original: もうちょっと付き合ってくださいませ
subtitles.english: Please stick with me a little longer

subtitles.original: 跳躍時だてに 減速なんてございません
subtitles.english: There's no slowing down when we're jumping

subtitles.original: ずっと見ていてくださいな
subtitles.english: Please keep watching us forever

subtitles.original: そっぽ向いてる未来はいりません
subtitles.english: I don't need a future that looks away

subtitles.original: 両目をごらんくださいませ
subtitles.english: Please look with both eyes

subtitles.original: 跳躍時の鼓動に退屈なんてございません
subtitles.english: There's no boredom in the heartbeat when jumping

subtitles.original: 飛んで来な
subtitles.english: Fly on over

subtitles.original: めちゃ進む
subtitles.english: Keep moving forward

subtitles.original: 都市部を抜けて遊び場へ
subtitles.english: Through the city to the playground

subtitles.original: いぇい！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ダメダメ ダメダメ
subtitles.english: No way, no way

subtitles.original: ダメダメ ダメダメ
subtitles.english: No way, no way

subtitles.original:
シュガーラッシュ
作詞・作曲：DECO*27
編曲：TAKU INOUE
subtitles.english:
Sugar Rush
Lyrics & Composition: DECO*27
Arrangement: TAKU INOUE

subtitles.original: やっぱパパッパッパ
subtitles.english: As expected, pa-pa-pa-pa
